# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) has an inserter at position(x=39.5, y=-79.5) 
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.5, y=-78.5) has an inserter at position(x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Power generation structure at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport belt structure at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belts at positions (x=63.5, y=-53.5) and (x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that the burner entities have fuel before using them.
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that the entities have the necessary ingredients before using them.
### Errors when using steam engine without connection
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to the power grid before using it.
### Errors when using electricity group without plugging into electric network
- Ensure that the electricity group is plugged into the electric network before using it.
### Errors when using belt group without items
- Ensure that the belt group has items to transport before using it.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
